files.content: import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react - dom / client'; import { BrowserRouter } from 'react - router - dom'; import App from './ App'; import './ index.css'; const rootElement = document.getElementById ( 'root' ); if ( !rootElement ) throw new Error ( 'Failed to find the root element' ); const root = ReactDOM.createRoot ( rootElement ); root.render (; < React.StrictMode > ; < BrowserRouter > ; < App / > ; < / BrowserRouter > ; < / React.StrictMode > ; );

import React from 'react'; import { Routes, Route } from 'react - router - dom'; import Header from './ components / Header'; import Footer from './ components / Footer'; import Home from './ pages / Home'; import Products from './ pages / Products'; import Services from './ pages / Services'; const App: React.FC = ( ) = > { return (; < div className = "min - h - screen flex flex - col bg - beige text - brown" > ; < Header / > ; < main className = "flex - 1" > ; < Routes > ; < Route path = " / " element = { < Home / > } / > ; < Route path = " / products" element = { < Products / > } / > ; < Route path = " / services" element = { < Services / > } / > ; < / Routes > ; < / main > ; < Footer / > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default App;

{ 'root': './ ',; 'base': './ ',; 'plugins': [; { 'name': 'vite - plugin - react',; 'options': { 'jsx': 'automatic'; } } ],; 'resolve': { 'alias': { '@': ' / src'; } },; 'server': { 'port': 3000,; 'open': true,; 'cors': true; },; 'build': { 'outDir': 'dist',; 'assetsDir': 'assets',; 'minify': 'esbuild',; 'sourcemap': true; },; 'css': { 'preprocessorOptions': { 'scss': { 'additionalData': '@import './ src / styles / variables.scss'; '; } } },; 'define': { 'process.env': { } } }

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react - router - dom'; interface HomeProps { }; const Home: React.FC < HomeProps > = ( ) = > { return (; < div className = "min - h - screen p - 8 bg - gradient - to - r from - blue - 400 to - green - 400" > ; < div className = "max - w - 4xl mx - auto bg - white rounded - lg shadow - lg p - 6" > ; < h1 className = "text - 4xl font - bold mb - 4 text - gray - 800" > Welcome to General Business Education < / h1 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 700 mb - 6" > ; Discover valuable resources and insights to enhance your understanding of general business concepts.; Whether you're a student, educator, or professional, our platform offers a wealth of knowledge tailored; to your needs.; < / p > ; < h2 className = "text - 2xl font - semibold mb - 4" > Our Services < / h2 > ; < ul className = "list - disc list - inside mb - 6" > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > Comprehensive Courses < / li > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > Expert - Led Workshops < / li > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > Networking Opportunities < / li > ; < / ul > ; < Link to = " / courses" className = "inline - block bg - blue - 500 text - white py - 2 px - 4 rounded hover: bg - blue - 600" > ; Explore Courses; < / Link > ; < / div > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default Home;

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react - router - dom'; interface AboutProps { }; const About: React.FC < AboutProps > = ( ) = > { return (; < div className = "min - h - screen bg - gradient - to - r from - blue - 500 to - green - 500 p - 8" > ; < div className = "max - w - 4xl mx - auto bg - white rounded - lg shadow - lg p - 6" > ; < h1 className = "text - 4xl font - bold mb - 6 text - gray - 800" > About Us < / h1 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 700 mb - 4" > ; Welcome to our educational platform dedicated to empowering individuals with the knowledge and skills necessary for success in the business world.We offer a variety of courses tailored for students and professionals alike, ensuring that everyone has access to high - quality education.; < / p > ; < p className = "text - gray - 700 mb - 4" > ; Our mission is to provide a modern and engaging learning experience that meets the needs of our diverse audience.Whether you are a student looking to enhance your skills or a professional seeking to advance your career, we have something for you.; < / p > ; < p className = "text - gray - 700 mb - 4" > ; Join us as we explore the latest trends in business education and equip you with the tools to thrive in today's competitive landscape.; < / p > ; < Link to = " / " className = "text - blue - 600 hover: underline" > ; Back to Home; < / Link > ; < / div > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default About;

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react - router - dom'; interface ContactProps { }; const Contact: React.FC < ContactProps > = ( ) = > { return (; < div className = "min - h - screen p - 8 bg - gradient - to - r from - blue - 500 to - green - 500" > ; < div className = "max - w - 4xl mx - auto bg - white rounded - lg shadow - lg p - 6" > ; < h1 className = "text - 4xl font - bold text - gray - 800 mb - 6" > Contact Us < / h1 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > We are here to assist you with your educational needs.Reach out to us for any inquiries or support.< / p > ; < h2 className = "text - 2xl font - semibold mb - 4" > Our Services < / h2 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > We offer a range of services tailored for students and professionals in the business sector.< / p > ; < h2 className = "text - 2xl font - semibold mb - 4" > Get in Touch < / h2 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > Email: support@businesseducation.com < / p > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > Phone: ( 123 ) 456 - 7890 < / p > ; < Link to = " / " className = "text - blue - 500 hover: underline mt - 4 inline - block" > ; Back to Home; < / Link > ; < / div > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default Contact;

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react - router - dom'; interface ProductsProps { }; const Products: React.FC < ProductsProps > = ( ) = > { return (; < div className = "min - h - screen p - 8 bg - gradient - to - r from - blue - 500 to - green - 500" > ; < div className = "max - w - 4xl mx - auto bg - white rounded - lg shadow - lg p - 6" > ; < h1 className = "text - 4xl font - bold text - gray - 800 mb - 6" > Our Products < / h1 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > ; Explore our range of educational products designed to empower students and professionals alike.Our offerings include online courses, e - books, and interactive workshops tailored to enhance your business acumen.; < / p > ; < h2 className = "text - 2xl font - semibold text - gray - 700 mb - 4" > Featured Products < / h2 > ; < ul className = "grid grid - cols - 1 md: grid - cols - 2 gap - 4" > ; < li className = "border rounded - lg p - 4 shadow hover: shadow - lg transition" > ; < h3 className = "text - xl font - bold" > Business Fundamentals Course < / h3 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600" > Learn the essentials of business management and strategy.< / p > ; < Link to = " / products / business - fundamentals" className = "text - blue - 500 hover: underline" > Learn More < / Link > ; < / li > ; < li className = "border rounded - lg p - 4 shadow hover: shadow - lg transition" > ; < h3 className = "text - xl font - bold" > Effective Communication Workshop < / h3 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600" > Enhance your communication skills for professional success.< / p > ; < Link to = " / products / communication - workshop" className = "text - blue - 500 hover: underline" > Learn More < / Link > ; < / li > ; < / ul > ; < / div > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default Products;

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react - router - dom'; interface ServicesProps { }; const Services: React.FC < ServicesProps > = ( ) = > { return (; < div className = "min - h - screen p - 8 bg - gradient - to - r from - blue - 500 to - green - 500" > ; < div className = "max - w - 4xl mx - auto bg - white rounded - lg shadow - lg p - 6" > ; < h1 className = "text - 4xl font - bold mb - 6 text - gray - 800" > Our Services < / h1 > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > ; At our educational platform, we offer a variety of services designed to empower students and professionals alike.Our goal is to provide accessible and quality education for everyone.; < / p > ; < h2 className = "text - 2xl font - semibold mb - 4" > What We Offer: < / h2 > ; < ul className = "list - disc list - inside mb - 4" > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > Online Courses in Business Fundamentals < / li > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > Workshops and Webinars with Industry Experts < / li > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > One - on - One Mentorship Programs < / li > ; < li className = "text - gray - 600" > Resource Library with Educational Materials < / li > ; < / ul > ; < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > ; Our services are tailored to meet the needs of both students and professionals, ensuring you gain the skills necessary to succeed in the business world.; < / p > ; < Link to = " / " className = "text - blue - 500 hover: underline" > ; Back to Home; < / Link > ; < / div > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default Services;

import React from 'react'; interface HeaderProps { title: string; subtitle?: string; }; const Header: React.FC < HeaderProps > = ( { title, subtitle } ) = > { return (; < header className = "bg - beige - 200 p - 6 shadow - md" > ; < h1 className = "text - 2xl font - bold text - brown - 800" > { title } < / h1 > ; { subtitle && < h2 className = "text - lg text - brown - 600" > { subtitle } < / h2 > } < / header > ; ); }; export default Header;

import React from 'react'; interface FooterProps { year: number; companyName: string; links: { label: string; url: string } []; }; const Footer: React.FC < FooterProps > = ( { year, companyName, links } ) = > { return (; < footer className = "bg - gradient - to - r from - blue - 500 to - green - 500 text - white py - 6" > ; < div className = "container mx - auto text - center" > ; < p className = "mb - 4" > Â© { year } { companyName }.All rights reserved.< / p > ; < nav > ; < ul className = "flex justify - center space - x - 4" > ; { links.map ( ( link, index ) = > (; < li key = { index } > ; < a href = { link.url } className = "hover: underline" > ; { link.label } < / a > ; < / li > ; ) ) } < / ul > ; < / nav > ; < / div > ; < / footer > ; ); }; export default Footer;

import React from 'react'; interface NavigationProps { links: { name: string; url: string } []; }; const Navigation: React.FC < NavigationProps > = ( { links } ) = > { return (; < nav className = "bg - blue - 500 p - 4 rounded shadow - md" > ; < ul className = "flex space - x - 4" > ; { links.map ( ( link, index ) = > (; < li key = { index } > ; < a; href = { link.url } className = 'text - white hover: text - green - 300 transition duration - 200'; > ; { link.name } < / a > ; < / li > ; ) ) } < / ul > ; < / nav > ; ); }; export default Navigation;

import React from 'react'; interface HeroProps { title: string; subtitle?: string; ctaText?: string; onCtaClick?: ( ) = > void; }; const Hero: React.FC < HeroProps > = ( { title,; subtitle,; ctaText,; onCtaClick; } ) = > { return (; < section className = "flex flex - col items - center justify - center p - 8 bg - neutral - 100" > ; < h1 className = "text - 3xl font - bold text - brown - 800 mb - 4" > { title } < / h1 > ; { subtitle && < h2 className = "text - lg text - brown - 600 mb - 6" > { subtitle } < / h2 > } { ctaText && (; < button; onClick = { onCtaClick } className = 'bg - brown - 500 text - white px - 6 py - 2 rounded hover: bg - brown - 600 transition'; > ; { ctaText } < / button > ; ) } < / section > ; ); }; export default Hero;

import React from 'react'; interface ProductCardProps { title: string; description?: string; price: number; onAddToCart?: ( ) = > void; }; const ProductCard: React.FC < ProductCardProps > = ( { title,; description,; price,; onAddToCart; } ) = > { return (; < div className = "p - 6 bg - white rounded - lg shadow - md hover: shadow - lg transition - shadow duration - 300" > ; < h2 className = "text - xl font - semibold mb - 2 text - cool - blue - 500" > { title } < / h2 > ; { description && < p className = "text - gray - 600 mb - 4" > { description } < / p > } < p className = "text - lg font - bold text - cool - green - 600" > $ { price.toFixed ( 2 ) } < / p > ; { onAddToCart && (; < button; onClick = { onAddToCart } className = 'mt - 4 bg - cool - blue - 500 text - white px - 4 py - 2 rounded transition - colors duration - 300 hover: bg - cool - blue - 600'; > ; Add to Cart; < / button > ; ) } < / div > ; ); }; export default ProductCard;

import React, { useState } from 'react'; interface ContactFormProps { onSubmit: ( formData: { name: string; email: string; message: string } ) = > void; }; const ContactForm: React.FC < ContactFormProps > = ( { onSubmit } ) = > { const [name, setName] = useState < string > ( '' ); const [email, setEmail] = useState < string > ( '' ); const [message, setMessage] = useState < string > ( '' ); const handleSubmit = ( e: React.FormEvent ) = > { e.preventDefault ( ); onSubmit ( { name, email, message } ); setName ( '' ); setEmail ( '' ); setMessage ( '' ); }; return (; < div className = "p - 6 bg - white rounded - lg shadow - md" > ; < h2 className = "text - 2xl font - semibold mb - 4 text - cool - blue" > Contact Us < / h2 > ; < form onSubmit = { handleSubmit } > ; < div className = "mb - 4" > ; < label htmlFor = "name" className = "block text - gray - 700" > Name < / label > ; < input; type = 'text'; id = 'name'; value = { name } onChange = { ( e ) = > setName ( e.target.value ) } className = 'mt - 1 block w - full border border - gray - 300 rounded - md p - 2'; required; / > ; < / div > ; < div className = "mb - 4" > ; < label htmlFor = "email" className = "block text - gray - 700" > Email < / label > ; < input; type = 'email'; id = 'email'; value = { email } onChange = { ( e ) = > setEmail ( e.target.value ) } className = 'mt - 1 block w - full border border - gray - 300 rounded - md p - 2'; required; / > ; < / div > ; < div className = "mb - 4" > ; < label htmlFor = "message" className = "block text - gray - 700" > Message < / label > ; < textarea; id = 'message'; value = { message } onChange = { ( e ) = > setMessage ( e.target.value ) } className = 'mt - 1 block w - full border border - gray - 300 rounded - md p - 2'; rows = { 4 } required; / > ; < / div > ; < button; type = 'submit'; className = 'mt - 4 bg - blue - 500 text - white px - 4 py - 2 rounded'; > ; Send Message; < / button > ; < / form > ; < / div > ; ); }; export default ContactForm;

{ 'theme': { 'extend': { 'colors': { 'primary': '#1D4ED8',; 'secondary': '#9333EA',; 'accent': '#FBBF24',; 'neutral': '#3F3F46',; 'base - 100': '#FFFFFF',; 'info': '#3ABFF8',; 'success': '#36D399',; 'warning': '#FBBD23',; 'error': '#F87272'; },; 'fontFamily': { 'sans': ['Inter', "sans - serif"],; 'serif': ['Merriweather', "serif"],; 'mono': ['Fira Code', "monospace"]; } } },; 'variants': { 'extend': { } },; 'plugins': [],; 'purge': { 'enabled': true,; 'content': [; './ index.html',; './ src / * * / *.{ js, jsx, ts, tsx } '; ]; } }

export interface User { id: string; name: string; email: string; createdAt: Date; }; export interface Post { id: string; title: string; content: string; authorId: string; createdAt: Date; }; export interface Comment { id: string; postId: string; authorId: string; content: string; createdAt: Date; }; export type ApiResponse < T > = { data: T; error?: string; }; export function isValidEmail ( email: string ): boolean { const regex = / ^[^\s@] + @[^\s@] + \.[^\s@] + $ /; return regex.test ( email ); }; export function formatDate ( date: Date ): string { return date.toISOString ( ).split ( 'T' ) [0]; }; export function generateUniqueId ( ): string { return 'id - ' + Math.random ( ).toString ( 36 ).substr ( 2, 9 ); }

export interface User { id: number; name: string; email: string; }; export interface ApiResponse < T > { data: T; message: string; status: number; }; export type Nullable < T > = T | null; export const isNull = < T > ( value: Nullable < T > ): value is null = > { return value = = = null; }; export const isDefined = < T > ( value: T | undefined ): value is T = > { return value ! = = undefined; }; export const fetchData = async < T > ( url: string ): Promise < ApiResponse < T > > = > { const response = await fetch ( url ); const data = await response.json ( ); return { data,; message: response.ok ? 'Success': 'Error',; status: response.status,; }; }; export const debounce = < T extends (...args: any[] ) = > void > ( func: T, delay: number ) = > { let timeoutId: NodeJS.Timeout; return (...args: Parameters < T > ) = > { clearTimeout ( timeoutId ); timeoutId = setTimeout ( ( ) = > { func (...args ); }, delay ); }; };
